ingredients.item: ½ small red onion, finely diced

instructions.step: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large non-stick frying pan over a high heat and fry the onion for 5 minutes, or until softened and golden.  Spoon the onion and remaining ingredients into a food processor and blitz to a thick paste. With damp hands, shape 2 large burgers.  Heat 1 tbsp oil in the frying pan and fry the burgers, without moving or turning them, for 5 minutes or until golden on the base. Carefully turn the burgers and cook for a further 5 minutes or until golden on both sides. Serve in burger buns with plenty of salad.
